resources.string: ExtractR needs you to grant some permissions to continue.
If you are done with with the images that you want to export, click on any of the following buttons to export in the desired format. You can export your images as PDF document, Png, or Zip Format.
Oops! You have not saved any files yet. When you starting exporting your files, they will appear right here.

Hello there! We see that you have not donated to ExtractR. Because of this, you might continue to see Advertisements. We are really sorry for this, but this is the only way we can get some return for now in order to keep the project moving, and to build even more useful applications. However, we have made sure that our ads do not in anyway affect your user experience. You can donate any amount through the donations tab. After donating, you will no longer see adverts. Thank you.
Hello there! We see that you have donated towards this project. Thank you so much. Your donation will go a long way in keeping us motivated. We wish you a seamless experience with ExtractR.

ExtractR\'s use is simple and straightforward. It helps you to quickly extract all images from a PDF file easily. Before finalising your work, it lets you remove images that you don\'t need. You can export to your gallery, a PDF containing the images or a compressed ZIP file with the images. If there is any problem or there is a feature that you would like to see , please feel free to use the report button in the preferences tab. Thank you so much for trying ExtractR.
